metadata.name: Elite Pass Gold
metadata.description:
Elite Pass and Elegant infinity Card allows owners to have access to:

1.- Whitelisted new and old NFT collections. 2.- Early access to new collections. 3.- Up to 80% token price discounts. 4.- Unique token giveaways. 5.- Weekly $ETH giveaways. 6.- VIP community access. 7.- Exclusive content access. 8.- Access to NFTs or physical goods. 9.- Access to events. 10.- Free NFTs.
